owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

EXIT_1_NO_RETURN_STEP().notice: Step after which exit 1 can no longer be used.

MantlePortalDynamicConfig().notice: Dynamic configuration for the MantlePortal. Determines         if the system should be paused when initialized.

PROXY_TRANSFER_STEP().notice: Step where proxy ownership is transferred.

dynamicConfigSet().notice: Whether or not dynamic config has been set.

exit1().notice: First exit point, can only be called before step 3 is executed.

exited().notice: Whether or not the deployment has been exited.

finalize().notice: Tranfers admin ownership to the final owner.

finalized().notice: Whether or not the deployment is finalized.

oldL1CrossDomainMessenger().notice: Address of the old L1CrossDomainMessenger implementation.

step2().notice: Pauses the system by shutting down the L1CrossDomainMessenger and setting the         deposit halt flag to tell the Sequencer's DTL to stop accepting deposits.

step3().notice: Removes deprecated addresses from the AddressManager.

step4().notice: Transfers system ownership to the ProxyAdmin.

updateDynamicConfig((uint256,uint256),bo.notice: Allows the owner to update dynamic config.

EXIT_1_NO_RETURN_STEP().notice: Step after which exit 1 can no longer be used.

MantlePortalDynamicConfig().notice: Dynamic configuration for the MantlePortal. Determines         if the system should be paused when initialized.

PROXY_TRANSFER_STEP().notice: Step where proxy ownership is transferred.

dynamicConfigSet().notice: Whether or not dynamic config has been set.

exit1().notice: First exit point, can only be called before step 3 is executed.

exited().notice: Whether or not the deployment has been exited.

finalize().notice: Tranfers admin ownership to the final owner.

finalized().notice: Whether or not the deployment is finalized.

oldL1CrossDomainMessenger().notice: Address of the old L1CrossDomainMessenger implementation.

step2().notice: Pauses the system by shutting down the L1CrossDomainMessenger and setting the         deposit halt flag to tell the Sequencer's DTL to stop accepting deposits.

step3().notice: Removes deprecated addresses from the AddressManager.

step4().notice: Transfers system ownership to the ProxyAdmin.

updateDynamicConfig((uint256,uint256),bo.notice: Allows the owner to update dynamic config.

userdoc.notice: The SystemDictator is responsible for coordinating the deployment of a full Bedrock         system. The SystemDictator is designed to support both fresh network deployments and         upgrades to existing pre-Bedrock systems.

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

@notice Step where proxy ownership is transferred.
@notice System configuration.
@notice Dynamic configuration for the L2OutputOracle.

@notice Dynamic configuration for the MantlePortal. Determines

@notice Whether or not dynamic config has been set.
@notice Whether or not the deployment is finalized.
@notice Whether or not the deployment has been exited.
@notice Address of the old L1CrossDomainMessenger implementation.

@notice Checks that the current step is the expected step, then bumps the current step.
 @param _step Current step.
@param _config System configuration.
@notice Configures the ProxyAdmin contract.

@notice Pauses the system by shutting down the L1CrossDomainMessenger and setting the
         deposit halt flag to tell the Sequencer's DTL to stop accepting deposits.
@notice Removes deprecated addresses from the AddressManager.
@notice Transfers system ownership to the ProxyAdmin.
